response: Blitz's EMP rocket is a slow-moving guided missile that jams nearby electronics. Best used to disrupt campers or to push a choke point. Pro tip: manual detonation can catch enemies off guard.
Anansi calls in an AC-130H Spectre. The 40mm is for soft targets, but the 105mm can delete heavily armored tanks. Save the 105 for the big boys.
Ember drops a Trophy turret that intercepts projectiles. Pair her with brawlers like the M60A3E2 to create an unstoppable push. She also gets a speed boost when rushing allies.
Kent locks targets in his cone and calls ballistic strikes. His 'cursed luck' isn't just flavor—time your activation when enemies are clustered for multi-kills.
Hound reveals critical modules. This extends the mark duration. Great for coordinating with high-alpha DPM tanks. If you see a weak spot lit up, take the shot.
Reaper executes any tank below 420 HP. His ability loads a clip of high-crit shells. Execute resets the clip. Time your push for the cleanup phase.
Raketa heals and gets tokens on kills. Activate his ability for a rapid-fire shotgun. He excels in close quarters. Don't let his jokes fool you—he's deadly.
Chopper calls in a bomber that dazes enemies. Use it to reset fights or stall caps. He’s a bear of a man with a heart of gold... and a mean right hook.
Aircraft Carrier has a moving barge and multiple flank routes. Control the high ground on the carrier itself for vision advantage.
Nexus Dam offers vertical gameplay. Use the dam ridges to hull-down. Watch the side tunnels for flanks.
Scarred City supports Conquest and Plant & Defuse. The kite formation base layout favors mobile tanks. Don't get bogged down in the main street.
Sunstroke is a close-quarters desert map. Use the construction site to break line of sight. Light tanks excel here.
